Name: Don Eaton
Ocupação: President & CEO of Sauer Compressors USA /                                        Chairman of the Board for Sauer Compressors USA, Mexico, and Canada
Empresas:
Nome: Sauer Compressors USA 
Localização: North American Headquarters - Stevensville, MD 
Descrição: Sauer means Quality!  From our Products to our Employees, we are unmatched in the Medium and High Pressure Compressor Industry.  We provide cutting edge, high pressure solutions for Naval, Commercial Shipping, Petro (Oil), and Industrial Air and Gas applications.  We will custom engineer and design the system that you need and support you for a "Lifetime" of operation.  In fact, we offer the industry's only Lifetime Warranty!  We stand behind our products from start to finish and value lifetime client relationships.  With a compressor line that performs true 24/7 continuous duty cycles, we ARE High Quality, High Performance, High Pressure.  Natural Gas (CNG) - Nitrogen - Helium - Hydrogen - Oxygen - SF6 - Argon - you name it!  Once you know Sauer, you will make it part of your business requirements; Dependable up to 7000 psi - anywhere, anytime, anygas.  

We are continuously growing and searching for top performing talent to add to our organization.  Do you have the Sauer DNA?  Our winning team and family oriented culture drive our success!  We don't sell compressors.  We sell Sauer!!!       
Tempo de trabalho: 2006/2006 
Nível: President & CEO

Name: Theo Haast
Sumário:
Proactive results-focused senior business and financial executive with extensive international public & private company experience in diversified manufacturing and services industries. 

Energetic leader and team player with highest integrity and values who combines entrepreneurial business sense with excellent finance knowledge.  

Proven ability in leading and building finance teams that are acting as a business partner and change agent for continuous process improvements.

Collaborative leadership style promoting open communication and facilitating fact-based decision making process by providing analytical insightful business information.

Mergers & Acquisitions experience on buying and selling side; including post-acquisition integration and restructuring processes.

Strength in leveraging international experience in global multi-cultural companies with foreign operations.

Expertise: Financial Planning & Analysis, Strategic Planning, Mergers & Acquisitions, Integration & Restructuring, Performance Management, Cost & Project Accounting, International Finance, Consolidation (including foreign subsidiaries), Foreign Currency Transactions & Hedging, IFRS & US-GAAP, SEC reporting, Sarbanes-Oxley, Internal Controls, Treasury, Risk Management.
Ocupação: CFO of REHAU Americas | International | Diversified Industrial | Performance & Change Management | Finance
Empresas:
Nome: REHAU 
Localização: Leesburg, VA, USA 
Descrição: CFO at REHAU Americas responsible for business throughout North and South America with plant locations in USA, Canada, Mexico, Brazil, Argentina, Chile and Colombia. Also assumed President Americas responsibility in transitory dual role during 2019 and 2020.
REHAU is a global leading systems and service provider for polymer-based solutions in construction, industrial and automotive markets. Global headquarters are located in Germany and Switzerland. 
Tempo de trabalho: 2014/2014 
Nível: CFO Americas 

**
Nome: Fusion UV Systems Inc 
Localização: Gaithersburg, MD 
Descrição: Full financial responsibility for this independent operating company of Spectris PLC (publicly traded investment company – UK FTSE-250).  Fusion UV is worldwide leader in ultraviolet lamps for industrial curing applications for telecommunications, display, electronics, automotive and medical markets with international subsidiaries in Europe, Japan and China and distributors in many other countries. 
•	Played lead role in successful sale of Fusion UV Systems by Spectris to Heraeus (Germany) through a confidential competitive sale process to strategic and private equity buyers. Successfully completed the financial integration of Fusion UV within Heraeus and transitioned CFO responsibilities to Heraeus finance organization in Germany.
•	Drove international growth and increased operating margins by providing key insightful management information for decision making and keeping overhead cost down
•	Developed performance measurement systems and implemented SAP business intelligence tools that enabled better customer focused information and decisions
•	Restructured and streamlined  the international finance organization 
•	Repaired broken confidence in financial analysis reporting and performance measurement metrics upon arrival 
Tempo de trabalho: 2007/2013 
Nível: CFO 

**
Nome: Lafarge North America 
Localização: Herndon, VA and Alpharetta, GA 
Descrição: Publicly traded international construction materials company with North American revenues of $6+ billion (NYSE listed until a 2006 tender offer buy-out to 45%-minority shareholders by Lafarge SA, French parent company)

Finance positions held at Lafarge: 

VP FINANCE - Aggregate & Concrete division North Ameria (2005-2007);
•	Led finance transformation process, which centralized common accounting functions in a Shared Services Center and maintained business support functions in the regional business units
•	Successfully managed a transition period with significant organizational change and implementation of new Oracle ERP system

DIRECTOR OF FINANCE - Cement Southeast U.S. Business Unit (2004-2005);
•	Recognized as dynamic member of turn-around management team at this acquired business unit with net sales of $400 million.
•	Led integration of the finance function of a $100 million “bolt-on” acquisition

ASSISTENT CORPORATE CONTROLLER (2002-2004);
•	Managed team of 15 employees including following activities: Hyperion consolidation, SEC reporting (10K/10Q), financial reporting to French parent company (IFRS) and corporate accounting. 
•	Successfully implemented the new Sarbanes-Oxley requirements
•	Led purchase accounting of large complex $1.5 billion acquisition of Blue Circle North America
•	Assisted CFO in quarterly press releases and investor conference call preparations.

INTERNAL AUDIT MANAGER (2000-2002).
•	Re-engineered internal audit function including introduction of successful risk assessment process and quarterly presentations to Audit Committee of Board of Directors
•	Led M&A due diligence projects from financial and internal control perspectives. 
Tempo de trabalho: 2000/2007 
Nível: VP Finance

Descrição: Succesfully served multinational clients such as Procter & Gamble, Dow Chemical, Monsanto, Lafarge.
Started career with Deloitte in The Netherlands and was selected for exchange assignment to Deloitte U.S. in global development program

Name: Éd Pinharbel Silvério
Sumário:
- Especialista em vendas estratégicas utilizando técnicas avançadas de vendas e negociações. 
Vivência de dezoito anos na área comercial com sólidos conhecimentos em processos de vendas, gestão comercial e planejamento mercadológico.
- Responsável pela área Comercial com sólida experiência profissional, desenvolvida em empresa do segmento metalúrgico, fabricante de equipamentos para movimentação de materiais, com abrangência no atendimento em todos os segmentos da economia, Brasil e América Latina.
- Contratação e manutenção da equipe de representantes comerciais (nível Brasil e América Latina)
- Forte Atuação em negociações e prospecções de clientes de diversos segmentos (Indústrias automobilísticas, alimentos, transformação) Hotelaria em geral, Supermercados, Atacadistas, Cash & Carry, Distribuidores em geral, redes de fast food e etc.
- Sólida experiência em formação e controle de metas de vendas, análises de mercados concorrentes e novas oportunidades.
- Gerenciamento do departamento de Administração de Vendas, abrangendo, controle do Budget, elaboração de preços / Margens de contribuição, mapeamentos, análises de mercado, formação da equipe interna de (Administrativos de vendas, Consultores de vendas e Supervisores); 
- Sólida experiência em Marketing, englobando todas as ações em mídias e feiras e eventos,       (Participação em feiras no Brasil e países da América do Sul), acompanhamentos de resultados por ações desenvolvidas por segmento,  contratos com revistas especializadas para publicação de mídias e releases.
- Maior satisfação em entender a necessidade do cliente e oferecer a melhor solução do mercado concretizando sempre uma relação de parceria de longo prazo.
Ocupação: Gerente de Vendas e Marketing - América Latina na RCG Indústria Metalúrgica Ltda - Rod-Car

- Contratação e manutenção da equipe de representantes comerciais (nível Brasil e América Latina)
- Forte Atuação em negociações e prospecções de clientes de diversos segmentos (Indústrias automobilísticas, alimentos, transformação) Hotelaria em geral, Supermercados, Atacadistas, Cashy & Carry, Distribuidores em geral, redes de fast food e etc.
- Sólida experiência em formação e controle de metas de vendas, análises de mercados concorrentes e novas oportunidades.
- Responsável também em Administração de Vendas, responsável pelo controle de Budget, formação de preços, mapeamentos, análises de mercado, formação da equipe interna de administração de vendas.
- Sólida experiência em Marketing, forecasting e Budget. Negociações junto as gráficas, montadoras de estendes para feiras e eventos, (montagem e participação em feiras no Brasil e países da América do Sul), acompanhamentos de resultados por ações desenvolvidas por segmento, contratos com revistas especializadas para publicação de mídias,
